name: LabelingSystem
body:
### Welcome to the Labeling System

The Labeling System project develops a prototype of a web based editor for controlled vocabularies. The system relies on the concept of linked-data implementing technologies and formats to semantically model the relationship and meaning of concepts from a set of thesauri. The resulting RDF graphs representing the vocabularies are accessible via a REST interface and suitable for fostering research across scientific disciplines.

I Sourcecode

  * Netbeans Projekt (PEACH server version 04/2015): https://github.com/i3mainz/LabelingSystem/tree/master/server/Peach
  * JavaDoc: [labelingserver](http://htmlpreview.github.io/?https://raw.githubusercontent.com/i3mainz/LabelingSystem/tree/master/server/Peach/javadoc/labelingserver/index.html)
  * JavaDoc: [rest](http://htmlpreview.github.io/?https://raw.githubusercontent.com/i3mainz/LabelingSystem/tree/master/server/Peach/javadoc/rest/index.html)
  * JavaDoc: [rdfutils](http://htmlpreview.github.io/?https://raw.githubusercontent.com/i3mainz/LabelingSystem/tree/master/server/Peach/javadoc/rdfutils/index.html)
  * JavaScript client version (STRAWBERRY client version 04/2015): https://github.com/i3mainz/LabelingSystem/tree/master/client/Strawberry

II Project

  * Demo: http://labeling.i3mainz.hs-mainz.de
  * FAQ: http://labeling.i3mainz.hs-mainz.de/faq
  * Technology: http://labeling.i3mainz.hs-mainz.de/technology
  * http://i3mainz.hs-mainz.de/en/projekte/labelingsystem

III Ontology

  * [Labeling System Vocabulary](http://labeling.i3mainz.hs-mainz.de/vocab)
  * [Labeling System Ontology](http://labeling.i3mainz.hs-mainz.de/ontology)

IV Data

  * public vocabularies: http://labeling.i3mainz.hs-mainz.de/ProjectTreePublic/tree.jsp?height=700&width=2000&name=example
